S.M.A.R.T
budgeting technique is a
practical method for setting
financial goals that are clear,
realistic and achievable.
By applying the five key
elements: Specific,
Measurable, Achievable,
Realistic and Time-frame, you
can plan to achieve RM6,000
in savings per year by saving
RM500 monthly.
This approach helps you build
stronger saving habits, reach
personal financial goals and
manage money more
effectively.
Start small, stay consistent,
and let every step bring you
closer to your financial goals.
